original_text: This is what each of you keeps saying to your friends and other Israelites: ‘What is the Lord’s answer?’ or ‘What has the Lord spoken?’
korean_text: 너희는 서로 이웃과 형제에게 묻기를 여호와께서 무엇이라 응답하셨으며 여호와께서 무엇이라 말씀하셨느냐 하고

sentences.original_text: This is what each of you keeps saying
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희 각자가 계속 말하는 것이다

sentences.original_text: to your friends and other Israelites:
